items.title: Bacon Wrapped Bitcoin (BWB)
items.summary: Welcome to the past and the future my friends. A future wrapped in sizzling, deliciousness. Where all are united with one universal truth: Everything is Better Wrapped in Bacon!* BNB was made just for fun and sharing a bacon-wrapped token with friends. The BNB crew make one promise to you: We don't promise you anything! We're not going to fill your head with a bunch of BS claims about how we're going to change the world, banking, gaming, gambling, the Internet, or whatever. In fact, look at our roadmap below: We're really just doing this for fun. To pass the time a bit before our invitable deaths where we are likely to be forgotten forever, given enough time and the known nature of the universe. (not) The Team Here are some random images I generated from https://thispersondoesnotexist.com/ if they make you feel better about investing in BWB. They are not real people and had nothing to do with anything. Older White Businessman He looks like a trustworthly businessman doesn't he? He's probably wise because he's older, and ooh he's wearing a suit! Somewhat Attractive Marketing Lady Every nonexistant team needs an attractive marketing lady because everyone nobody knows marketing better than them. What else is there to know? Young Vaguely European Developer We all know that young, vaguely European dudes make the best developers, so here is a picture of one. He's young, he's hip, he's a developer maybe. Token Stuff Alright, if you've made it this far, perhaps you'd actually like to invest in this token.
items.content_html:
Welcome to the past and the future my friends. A future wrapped in sizzling, deliciousness. Where all are united with one universal truth:
Everything is Better Wrapped in Bacon!*
 
BNB was made just for fun and sharing a bacon-wrapped token with friends. The BNB crew make one promise to you:
We don't promise you anything!
 
We're not going to fill your head with a bunch of BS claims about how we're going to change the world, banking, gaming, gambling, the Internet, or whatever.
 

In fact, look at our roadmap below:

 
We're really just doing this for fun. To pass the time a bit before our invitable deaths where we are likely to be forgotten forever, given enough time and the known nature of the universe.
 

(not) The Team

 
Here are some random images I generated from https://thispersondoesnotexist.com/ if they make you feel better about investing in BWB. They are not real people and had nothing to do with anything.

 

 

Token Stuff

Alright, if you've made it this far, perhaps you'd actually like to invest in this token.
